thread.title: An Art-Centered Hamptons Home

author: Leigh Kamping-Carder
title: An Art-Centered Hamptons Home
text:
Steven Sergiovanni and Chris Satek spent years amassing art. Unfortunately, living in a one-bedroom apartment in Manhattanâ€™s Chelsea neighborhood meant that most of it sat in storage.
Then in May 2015, Mr. Sergiovanni, a 53-year-old art adviser, and Mr. Satek, a 56-year-old graphic designer, paid $650,000 for a three-bedroom, 1,600-square-foot house in East Hampton, N.Y. The following January, the longtime couple kicked off a roughly one-year, $595,000 remodel that turned the dated 1973 structure into a minimalist retreat... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
